# 3.4 Create Inspection API endpoints

**Linear Issue:** [BUI-34](https://linear.app/builder-project/issue/BUI-34/34-create-inspection-api-endpoints)
**Priority:** Medium
**Status:** Backlog


## Description

Create FastAPI endpoints for inspections.

**File:** backend/app/api/v1/inspections.py

**Template Endpoints (Admin):**

* GET /inspection-consultant-types - List consultant types with stages
* POST /inspection-consultant-types - Create consultant type
* GET /inspection-consultant-types/{id} - Get with stages
* POST /inspection-consultant-types/{id}/stages - Add stage template

**Project Inspection Endpoints:**

* GET /projects/{project_id}/inspections - List all inspections
* GET /projects/{project_id}/inspections/pending - List pending inspections
* POST /projects/{project_id}/inspections - Schedule inspection
* GET /projects/{project_id}/inspections/{id} - Get inspection details
* PUT /projects/{project_id}/inspections/{id} - Update inspection
* POST /projects/{project_id}/inspections/{id}/complete - Mark completed
* POST /projects/{project_id}/inspections/{id}/findings - Add finding
* PUT /inspections/findings/{finding_id} - Update finding

**Dashboard:**

* GET /projects/{project_id}/inspections/summary - Inspection progress summary
